title: FRIDAY - Big Super Bowl LV announcement 2020
itunes:title: FRIDAY - Big Super Bowl LV announcement 2020
description:
Week 10 kicking off (0:15) with first place in the AFC South on the line as the Colts outduel the Titans. Hear from Philip Rivers (0:48)on what the win meant to his team. Cam Newton and Lamar Jackson set to face off on Sunday (1:28) as Newton expressed is respect for what Jackson has been able to accomplish (2:05). We have the latest on Ben Roethlisberger (2:50) and Nick Chubb's (3:18) status for Sunday's action. Plus, a HUGE announcement for Super Bowl LV in Tampa!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
